column5: Anyone have any info, good or bad on this lodge? Looking for clean, reasonable place for walleye and pike. Good numbers with a chance at some decent fish. Thanks......
Surely someone has been here. Or knows someone who has been heree, or knows somebody who knows somebody thats been here.
Been there, nice place, not enough fish, you can find better.
I have heard a lot of good things about happy day lodge. Looks like check out there is on Friday's though which I wouldn't like.
